summary: government league table shows high levels of child poverty in falinge .   72 per cent of people are unemployed and seven per cent have never worked .   mp calls for action to halt the decline but the council plays down the data .   it is one of nine areas in greater manchester to be ranked in the top 50 .   the international red cross warns of fresh riots on britain 's streets .
